roleset.name: to draw or take away
roleset.note: ABSTRACT-V NOTES: Verbnet entry 10.1. No FNcls. (from abstract.01-v)

example.name: abstract-v: in the ether
example.text: John was incapable of abstracting Mary from his own prejudices.

example.name: abstract-v: passive
example.text: Anti-transcendent skepticism holds that thought-1 can not be abstracted *trace*-1 away from some natural or material preconditions
example.arg: away from some natural or material preconditions

example.name: abstraction-n
example.text: One Cuil = One level of abstraction away from the reality of a situation.
example.arg: away from the reality of a situation
